alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 07 at 10:25PM CST until November 08 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas immediately near Lake Superior will see periods of rain mixing in with snow. Some light ice accumulation will be possible as well tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
